description.value:
Special: Blast (8), Felling (6), Overheats, Recharge

Note: 13 Metres Long, used only by Titans and Rare Superheavy Shadowswords. Anything of Size Hulking or Smaller instantly dies if hit by it. Anything armed with this that isn’t a Titan cannot move on the same turn they fire this weapon or if it is recharging.
